Show / Hide Table of Contents

Namespace DUKE.Controls

Classes

AreaSelector

Select a coordinate (X and Y value) by clicking on an area.

Clickable

Receives clicks and activations.

DesktopInput

Attached to a player object in hierarchy. DesktopInput receives input data through InputActions and converts them into Commands. Commands are then sent forward and processed or discarded depending on the target object. Use VRInput for VR functionality.

DesktopPlayerMovement

Attached to Player (Desktop) object in hierarchy. Controls the movement of player when in desktop mode using Rigidbody.

DetectInputDevices

Detects which input devices have been connected, and enables the correct Player prefab.

DrawArea

Highlightable

Receive information about being pointed.

Input

Base class for VRInput and DesktopInput.

InputField

Input alphanumeric data with VR controller or keyboard.

Interactable

Base class for all interaction classes for VR and desktop.

Movable

Allows moving of the specified Transform.

MovablePaperDoll

VRHeadset

Move the headset.

VRInput

Attached to a VR controller object in hierarchy. VRInput receives input data through InputActions and converts them into Commands. Commands are then sent forward and processed or discarded depending on the target object. Use DesktopInput for desktop functionality.

VRLaser

Controls the visual representation of a VR-controller's laser pointer.

VRTeleport

Allow user to move around in the environment with teleportation. WARNING: This component has been abandoned and is not used currently in the project. It does not currently have

VRThumbDial

Allows input of data with a VR controller's primary 2D axis. Also adds visuals to the controller.

VRVisuals

InputSource

InteractionMode

ThumbDialMode

Different modes for thumb dial. Implemented only partially.

WorldOrLocal
